short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A friendly reminder to stand up and move throughout the day

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stand-Up Reminder: Your Personal Wellness Assistant

Take control of your workplace health with Stand-Up Reminder, a simple yet effective Chrome extension that helps you maintain a healthy balance between sitting and standing throughout your workday.

Key Features:
• Customizable reminder intervals (30, 45, 60 minutes, or set your own)
• Adjustable standing duration (1-10 minutes)
• Quiet hours setting for work-life balance
• Gentle desktop notifications with snooze option
• Daily health tips for better workplace wellness

Benefits:
✓ Reduce prolonged sitting time
✓ Improve posture and circulation
✓ Prevent muscle stiffness
✓ Boost productivity with regular movement breaks
✓ Build healthy workplace habits

Perfect for:
• Remote workers
• Office professionals
• Students
• Anyone who spends long hours at the computer

Take the first step towards a healthier work routine with Stand-Up Reminder!
